texts.name: Tim
texts.biography: They call him Tim the Boar rider for a reason. Carelessly stampeding through a battlefield with his horde of Boars, he is usually the cause of much damage to both sides of every conflict.

specialty.description: Increases Speed of any Cliff Crawlers or Cave Jumpers by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for 2 levels (rounded up).
specialty.name: Cliff Crawlers
